source_text.raw_block:
Clairvoyance (Mvination)
Range: Special
Components: V, S, M
Duration: 1 round/level
Casting Time: 3
Area of Effect: Special
Saving Throw: None
Similar to the clairaudience spell, the
clairvoyance spell empowers the wizard to
see in his mind whatever is within sight
range from the spell locale chosen. Distance
from the wizard is not a factor, but the lo-
cale must be known-familiar or obvious.
Furthermore, light is a factor, as the spell
does not enable the use of infravision or
